summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 13th Avenue South, from Hanford Street to College Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9270 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district thereon, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
